attributes.action: ch5 - go back to ch4 BB guide
attributes.additional_details:
24 hours and life begins 12.06.13

9am in the morning,
you are coming home to roost,
so i am putting out this "alert" warning,
if you want a life boast.
i can not wait,
yes i am worried for the hood,
because the last were a bad plait,
i solely blame "deadwood".
a little shake around,
the taste will be like "Phyllis",
Brian will always be "heaven" bound,
i am preying for "Emma Willis".
Rhylan will be a delight,
not one bit dark,
the job he landed is so right,
can not wait to see mr "Clark".
please please please big brother,
look at ch4 BB guide,
go back to basic cover,
and pure entertainment, stress,enjoyment will provide.
